category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 42 (Establishment of Management Goals)
contents: Article 42 (Establishment of management goals) ① The chairman sets mid- to long-term management goals for at least five fiscal years, including the following year, in consideration of business content and management environment, confirms them through resolution by the board of directors, and maintains health and safety goals by October 31 of each year. It must be submitted to the Minister of Health and Welfare and the Minister of Strategy and Finance. Revised 2009. 6. 2., 2010. 3. 3., 2014. 12. 29., ② If it is desired to change the management goal established pursuant to Paragraph 1, the changed matter must be confirmed through resolution by the Board of Directors. This must be submitted to the Minister of Health and Welfare and the Minister of Strategy and Finance. Revised 2022. 1. 5.
